TopicTitle: Devnote Tuesday: A week of Experimental Testing

Articles.Content:
STOCK AIRSHIPS WHOOOOOOO!!!!

Did someone say Airships?

Yes, but is it necessary? Just because it is in the real world is not a reason to add it to the game. There is no focus for it, unless they add boat parts which is unlikely. The functionality of the editor would be no different than the SPH.

Well, if people are going to get hung up building boats (and some will), a dock to launch such vessels could be something to look into. Otherwise, people making boats or seaplanes will need to make an amphibious vessel of sorts and drive it to the shore.

Well, if people are going to get hung up building boats (and some will), a dock to launch such vessels could be something to look into. Otherwise, people making boats or seaplanes will need to make an amphibious vessel of sorts and drive it to the shore.

Hyperedit covers this. Dock is silly.

Hyperedit covers this. Dock is silly.

Dont be so quick to ridicule. Not everyone does mods. A dock would open up sea craft to a lot more people.

Scott Manley just published a video about 1.0.5

Not a lot to wait for us

Hyperedit covers this. Dock is silly.

A dock as an alternative to launching on the pad or runway is a good idea, just add a 'launch from dock' button or right click on the existing launch button.

Well, if people are going to get hung up building boats (and some will), a dock to launch such vessels could be something to look into. Otherwise, people making boats or seaplanes will need to make an amphibious vessel of sorts and drive it to the shore.

Well I honestly don't care if they add one, but there is so much more to do. Maybe they could add stuff like that after we get more of the other promised stuff out like Unity 5 or Multiplayer. I certainly don't want to object for those who want it, since it wouldn't impact my game at all, it's just in the past buildings took a lot of effort for Squad and it isn't the focus of this game.

- - - Updated - - -

Whoa... it just hit me... if they are writing code for an underwater buoyancy model, how much harder is it to code in an atmospheric buoyancy model? STOCK AIRSHIPS WHOOOOOOO!!!!

Already asked and answered. NathanKell said for performance reasons buoyancy only affect water (and just slightly above it). So modding in helium would not actually make it lighter than air, which doesn't have buoyancy. Maybe someday, after Unity 5.

Well I honestly don't care if they add one, but there is so much more to do. Maybe they could add stuff like that after we get more of the other promised stuff out like
Actually, I agree. If anything, I'd like more space station and base parts.

But Squad is putting effort into airplanes and people seem to like it.

Did someone say Airships?

http://i.giphy.com/rc9Go2x2bX04M.gif

Airships Conquer the Skies FTW!! STEAMPUNK FTW!!!!!!!!! YAY AIRSHIPS! Also, airships: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/121491-Zeppelin-Development-Handegg-Brynhildr-Valkyrie-biplane

Dont be so quick to ridicule. Not everyone does mods. A dock would open up sea craft to a lot more people.

This is a spaceship game, with airplanes because reasons. Boats are the afterthought (people's hopes) of an afterthought (hey we finally fixed water 5 versions after release). Adding a dock says "We actually intend you to make boats" which - from what I can tell - is not even remotely Squad's goal. Nor do I think it should be.

Therefore, mods is EXACTLY where you should turn if you want to do any serious boating in this game.

This is a spaceship game, with airplanes because reasons. Boats are the afterthought (people's hopes) of an afterthought (hey we finally fixed water 5 versions after release). Adding a dock says "We actually intend you to make boats" which - from what I can tell - is not even remotely Squad's goal. Nor do I think it should be.

Therefore, mods is EXACTLY where you should turn if you want to do any serious boating in this game.

I still think Squad should jump on ideas like this for sequel games. Kerbal Boat Program, Kerbal Flight Program, same general construction as KSP but in a separate game where they focus the game on specific goals. They have most the work started in KSP so it wouldn't even be starting from scratch.

Edited November 7, 2015 by Alshain

This is a spaceship game, with airplanes because reasons. Boats are the afterthought (people's hopes) of an afterthought (hey we finally fixed water 5 versions after release). Adding a dock says "We actually intend you to make boats" which - from what I can tell - is not even remotely Squad's goal. Nor do I think it should be.

Therefore, mods is EXACTLY where you should turn if you want to do any serious boating in this game.

Well, you see, the place on the runway where you start and the actual water is a long way away, especially if you're inching along in a boat suspended by rickety wheels going about 10 or so meters a second. and although the launchpad is closer, it's also smaller, prohibiting anything large, and the steep incline keeps it off limits. even with mod(s) you generally just get parts to make boats, not an actual place to spawn them from.

Well, you see, the place on the runway where you start and the actual water is a long way away, especially if you're inching along in a boat suspended by rickety wheels going about 10 or so meters a second. and although the launchpad is closer, it's also smaller, prohibiting anything large, and the steep incline keeps it off limits. even with mod(s) you generally just get parts to make boats, not an actual place to spawn them from.

Then don't just use the part mod. Use the part mod and then also use the dock mod. If there isn't one now, there will be soon if there is enough interest in one for a modder to want to make it. I don't even think (compared to the difficulty level of the current added launch sites) it'd be particularly difficult to do in Kerbal Konstructs.
Sooo.... no word on the media group application replies? Are those still happening? Or should I just consider not to have been selected, with 1.0.5 now already shown?

Sooo.... no word on the media group application replies? Are those still happening? Or should I just consider not to have been selected, with 1.0.5 now already shown?

I wish they would hurry up, we have two YouTube videos 24 hours after media release and one is just an artsy thing. Twitch is... OK, but I'd rather have concise Youtube videos and just dump Twitch to be honest..
